incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

extracted_data_phrases: to family members , friends , or colleagues with vulgar or inappropriate language
incontinence.question: Did I lack self-control and speak to family members, friends, or colleagues with vulgar or inappropriate language?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

extracted_data_phrases: to my body or well - being
gluttony.question: Did I excessively indulge in eating or drinking, causing harm to my body or well-being?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking in ways that compromised my physical health ,
in ways that compromised my physical health ,
rather than cultivating a healthy balance
gluttony.question: Did I overindulge in eating or drinking in ways that compromised my physical health, rather than cultivating a healthy balance?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: to an unhealthy attachment to worldly pleasures
gluttony.question: Did you engage in excessive eating or drinking, such that it led to an unhealthy attachment to worldly pleasures?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: in sharing someone else 's personal affairs
gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in sharing someone else's personal affairs, even if they were true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

extracted_data_phrases: about someone 's private affairs or faults
for my own entertainment or to impress others
gossip.question: Have I spoken about someone's private affairs or faults, even if what I shared was true, for my own entertainment or to impress others?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

extracted_data_phrases: in sharing unverified information about others
gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in sharing unverified information about others, even if what I shared was well-intentioned?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

extracted_data_phrases: for a purpose that is contrary to its sanctity
impiety.question: Did I use Sunday for a purpose that is contrary to its sanctity, especially when it could have been avoided?
impiety.description: It's irreverent to work on a Sunday as it's a holy day of rest, worship, and a day of protest against the servitude of work and the worship of money (CCC).

extracted_data_phrases: in work that detracted from my family 's Sunday rest
impiety.question: Did I engage in work that detracted from my family's Sunday rest, when it was possible to avoid doing so?
impiety.description: It's irreverent to work on a Sunday as it's a holy day of rest, worship, and a day of protest against the servitude of work and the worship of money (CCC).
